sect2.title: Installation of Gzip
sect2.para: Before Gzip is installed, the patch file may need to be applied. This patch file is necessary to avoid a conflict of variable names with Glibc-2.0 systems when compiling and linking statically and so is only required if your base system runs Glibc-2.0. It is however safe to apply the patch even if you are running a different glibc version, so if you aren't sure, it's best to apply it.
